text: Ni shuo:“Renmen a! Wo que shi an la pai lai jiaohua nimen quanti [zhu] de shizhe. Ta [an la] yongyou tiandi de zhuquan, chu ta wai, zai meiyouying shou chongbai de zhu. Ta neng shi sizhe sheng, neng shi sheng zhe si. Suoyi, nimen dang xinyang an la ji qi shizhe——na wei bu shi zi de xianzhi [mu sheng], ta [mu sheng] xinyang an la ji qi yanyu [“gulanjing”]. Nimen dang zhuisui ta [mu sheng], yibian nimen zunxing zhengdao.”
